title: install dumps lots of output from annex at the end for some reason
body:
my guess ATM that it does it if/when some 'get' fails and it is a recursive call

```shell
$> datalad install -r -J4 -g falkor:/srv/datasets.datalad.org/www/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-2
[INFO   ] Installing dataset at /tmp/phantom-2 from falkor:/srv/datasets.datalad.org/www/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-2 
[INFO   ] Getting 1 items of dataset <Dataset path=/tmp/phantom-2> ... 
[INFO   ] Actually getting 204 files 
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
1 installed item is available at
<Dataset path=/tmp/phantom-2>
```
which is a bit misleading to start with since all files failed to get and we didn't even produce INFO log about that.... but then if we install top dataset with recursion (full log:  http://www.onerussian.com/tmp/datalad-get-20161130-1.log )
```shell

$> datalad install -r -J4 -g falkor:/srv/datasets.datalad.org/www/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014 2>&1 | tee datalad-get-`mdate`-1.log
[INFO] Installing dataset at /tmp/bids_test4-20161014 from falkor:/srv/datasets.datalad.org/www/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014       
[INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/tmp/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1> 
[INFO] Installing subdataset <Dataset path=/tmp/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-2> 
...
[INFO] Getting 2 items of dataset <Dataset path=/tmp/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1> ... 
[INFO] Actually getting 212 files 
Total (0 o[INFO] Getting 2 items of dataset <Dataset path=/tmp/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-2> ... 
....
[INFO] Actually getting 212 files 
          k, 204 failed out of 204)  0%|          | 0.00/52.0M [00:00<?, ?B/s]
Total (0 o[INFO] Getting 1 items of dataset <Dataset path=/tmp/bids_test4-20161014> ... 
          k, 212 failed out of 212)  0%|          | 0.00/53.2M [00:00<?, ?B/s]
1870 installed items are available at
<Dataset path=/tmp/bids_test4-20161014>
<Dataset path=/tmp/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1>
{u'skipped': [], u'file': u'phantom-1/MoCoSeries/1.3.12.2.1107.5.2.43.66112.2016101409265385049702228.dcm', u'success': False, u'note': u'Try making some of these repositories available:\n\t3427d192-9c51-484b-9554-a482ff62f25f -- yoh@hopa:~/picts/mris/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1\n \t9feb7d29-3b9d-47c3-bc0f-3ecd566af490 -- yoh@smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1\n', u'command': u'get', u'key': u'MD5E-s153016--129eae4207585bbf0ef387ae063ac1aa.dcm', u'wanted': [{u'uuid': u'3427d192-9c51-484b-9554-a482ff62f25f', u'here': False, u'description': u'yoh@hopa:~/picts/mris/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1'}, {u'uuid': u'9feb7d29-3b9d-47c3-bc0f-3ecd566af490', u'here': False, u'description': u'yoh@smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1'}]}
{u'skipped': [], u'file': u'phantom-1/MoCoSeries/1.3.12.2.1107.5.2.43.66112.2016101409270823880402248.dcm', u'success': False, u'note': u'Try making some of these repositories available:\n\t3427d192-9c51-484b-9554-a482ff62f25f -- yoh@hopa:~/picts/mris/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1\n \t9feb7d29-3b9d-47c3-bc0f-3ecd566af490 -- yoh@smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1\n', u'command': u'get', u'key': u'MD5E-s152998--4d40655077fc741842634d7dfcc16299.dcm', u'wanted': [{u'uuid': u'3427d192-9c51-484b-9554-a482ff62f25f', u'here': False, u'description': u'yoh@hopa:~/picts/mris/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1'}, {u'uuid': u'9feb7d29-3b9d-47c3-bc0f-3ecd566af490', u'here': False, u'description': u'yoh@smaug:/mnt/datasets/datalad/crawl/dicoms/dartmouth-phantoms/bids_test4-20161014/phantom-1'}]}
...
```

This was with 0.4.1 released but situation is similar with 0.4.1.dev92
